com.team23.weather.gui

Class DailyForecastPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.team23.weather.gui.DailyForecastPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocaleObserver, ILocationObserver, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DailyForecastPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ILocationObserver, ILocaleObserver
    A DailyForecastPanel extends JPanel. A DailyForecastPanel implements the IWeatherDataObserver interface, to listen for weather changes. A DailyForecastPanel implements the ILocaleObserver interface, to listen to locale changes. A DailyForecastPanel displays all the weather information from a daily CompoundForecast to the user. This includes the date of the forecast, the minimum and maximum Temperature's, and the sky condition.
    Author:
    Tim Whelan
    See Also:
    OwmClient, CompoundForecast, WeatherData, JPanel, DailyForecastItemPanel, Serialized Form
